SELECT application_id as id, student.`name` as studentName, school.school_name as schoolName, department.`name` as departmentName, job_application.`status` as status, recruitment_info.job_title as jobTitle, user.account as studentAccount FROM student, school, department, job_application, recruitment_info, enterprise_user, user WHERE enterprise_user.user_id = #{userId} AND enterprise_user.enterprise_id = recruitment_info.enterprise_id AND recruitment_info.recruitment_id = job_application.recruitment_id AND recruitment_info.department_id = department.department_id AND job_application.student_id = student.student_id AND job_application.enterprise_visible = 1 AND student.school_id = school.school_id AND student.student_id = user.user_id
AND school.school_name = #{schoolName}
AND department.name = #{departmentName}
AND job_application.status = 2
AND job_application.status = 1
AND (job_application.status = 1 OR job_application.status = 2)
AND job_application.status = 0
AND (job_application.status = 0 OR job_application.status = 2)
AND (job_application.status = 0 OR job_application.status = 1)
AND (job_application.status = 0 OR job_application.status = 1 OR job_application.status = 2)
